lessons.japanese: いらっしゃいませんか？
どのくらい日本にいらっしゃいますか。
lessons.indonesian: How long have you been in Japan?

lessons.japanese: 君の都合のよいときに遊びにいらっしゃい。
lessons.indonesian: Come and see me when it is convenient for you.

lessons.japanese: お子さんは何人いらっしゃいますか？
lessons.indonesian: How many children do you have?

lessons.japanese: 何が起こってもいいように用心をしていらっしゃい。
lessons.indonesian: Keep on the watch for anything to come.

lessons.japanese: ヨーロッパで楽しんでいらっしゃいよ。
lessons.indonesian: I hope you will have a good time in Europe.

lessons.japanese: マイクさんいらっしゃいますか。
lessons.indonesian: May I speak to Mike, please?

lessons.japanese: マイクと申しますが、博さんはいらっしゃいますか。
lessons.indonesian: This is Mike speaking. May I speak to Hiroshi, please?

lessons.japanese: パーティーにいらっしゃいませんか。
lessons.indonesian: Can you come to the party?
